response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. It's an investment piece that not only adds value to your collection but also enhances your business operations significantly. Given its worth and the benefits it offers, we're extending a special offer to you. We propose to sell the product to you for $10,000. This price reflects the value we place on maintaining long-term relationships with our esteemed clients while ensuring you receive the best possible deal. Please let us know if this offer meets your expectations.", "product_price": 10000}
